Master Themis: You so-called adventurers make me laugh. You're nothing more than a bunch of dilettantes with swords and shields! I'm amazed you can defeat even a troop of Bunny Scouts, much less a horde of undead monsters... Oh, did I offend you? Tough! If you want to make something of it, let's go. I promise you that I can bury my blade into your heart before you have time to blink...
